document.full_text: william c. rhoden says what may be more intriguing than dirk nowitzki's quest for his first n.b.a. title is how the news media will choose to cover it and whether race will play a role.
document.title: video: rhoden on nowitzki's quest for a title
lines_and_colors: william c. rhoden says what may be more intriguing than dirk nowitzki's quest for his first n.b.a. title is how the news media will choose to cover it and whether race will play a role.
